a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Emissions of air pollutants, France, 1990 to 2015
Index of local air pollutant emissions since 1990. Annual emission levels are assumed to be 100 in 1990; values
less than 100 therefore indicate a reduction in emissions; values over 100 indicate an increase since 1990.
